Posts.Content: Hi Sarah I'm on my first cycle of FECT FEC first - day 6 - been ok - able to go to work - today just tired, bit spaced out, but been ok to be honest  Feel nauseous middle of the night but not bad after ginger cordial drink  Kay
Posts.Title: *** July 2017 Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi I'm on Day two of FEC-T and feel perfectly well today - I expected to feel unwell really but I guess this will hit at some point - any advice out there most welcome  Kay  Thame0517
